channel.title: Tranfering files with RDP is super fun and easy! on Hacking Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tranfering files with RDP is super fun and easy! on Hacking Blog

item.title: Using RDP
item.description: sudo xfreerdp3 /v:10.129.202.222 /u:dotpirate /p:'1231234!' /cert:ignore /size:90% +drive:dotpirate,/home/dotpirate/path/to/share
